titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation for preseruation of grounds for making of saltpeter, and to restore such grounds as are now destroyed, and to command assistance to be giuen to His Maiesties saltpeter- makers.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation for preseruation of grounds for making of saltpeter, and to restore such grounds as are now destroyed, and to command assistance to be giuen to His Maiesties saltpeter- makers.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie: And by the Assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at Our Court at Whitehall, the fourteenth day of March, in the tenth yeere of Our Reigne of England, Scotland, France, and Ireland."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
